bgDescription: A private dish made by digging a hole in the tofu and filling it with special minced meat. The tofu that is dug out should not be wasted and can be made into other tofu snacks.
description: Obtain 50% more materials when defeating enemies in the overworld, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
obtainDescription: Obtain 50% more materials when defeating enemies in the overworld, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
unlockDescription: You need ["item=Stuffed Tofu Recipe"] to unlock it.
